name: 45 - Star Mask (spriteMask)
author: cDfy4cFieNjb5vsL
command:
let params = [
  {
    "filterType": "spriteMask",
    "filterId": "starMask",
    "imagePath": "modules/tokenmagic/fx/assets/star.webp",
    "repeat": false,
    "gridPadding": 1,
    "maintainAspectRatio": false,
    "maintainScale": false,
    "scaleX": 1,
    "scaleY": 1,
    "translationX": 0,
    "translationY": 0,
    "rotation": 0,
    "alpha": 1,
    "rank": 10000,
    "enabled": true
  }
];

await TokenMagic.addUpdateFiltersOnSelected(params);
